name: simple
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`simple` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-simple).

provider.description:
The provider type for the simple package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering resource resources.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking data_source.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by data_source.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.
